name: Burger Blast Token
description: BurgerBlast The BurgerBlast Token ($BBT) is the first project in the BUN ecosystem. is a community-driven meme token that combines the blockchain technology of the Ton mainnet with a burger-themed meme identity ​BurgerBlast goes beyond a simple meme token, pursuing real-world utility and a community-driven sustainable growth model. Starting with BurgerBlast, the ecosystem will gradually expand, establishing itself as an innovative blockchain project that provides new opportunities and rewards to participants.​ Join the world of BurgerBlast right now!​
